website_summaries.verdict: Mid-century modern design that looks as if it came from a trendy design store.
pros: Solid wood is sturdy and can withstand child play
Distressed vegan leather is buttery soft and natural looking
Easy assembly and good storage space can easily handle quilts and blankets
Huge bonus: A child safety hinge makes the lid close slowly to prevent lid from slamming
cons: Comes with plastic pins on the feet — users suggested replacing with felt pads

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, hard to find
customer_reviews.text: After some reviews coming damaged, mine did not. The package was damaged and questionable, but the product survived with some minor damage to the underlying wood pieces, this did not impact its structure. The color grey has some brown tones,but in my case this was ok. So not a true only grey. Overall I am happy with size and color, purpose and functionality of the product . It’s new so I can’t say how it will hold up yet.Its semi firm yet comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Came faster then it said! I was worried how this would be because of some really bad reviews that others posted but it’s perfect! No deflects or issues at all! Seems to have made quite the trip to my house too. It goes perfect with my couch and rug as it matches both brown and grey for the distressed grey taupe color. Very happy with this purchase. I hope it holds up well with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee S.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Great storage ottoman. The only downside is the weight limit is only 225lbs. I have a SMALLER AND CHEAPER ottoman that is collapsible that holds 350lbs. I assume this holds less weight because of how the legs go on. Overall very good piece and I would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen O.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful! More of a cloth than a leather, which I know it’s a “faux” leather but I was hoping it had some sort of water resistance to it. The smell on the inside is very strong and overwhelming at first, but I sprayed it with odor eliminator and it was gone within a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Ramee L.

customer_reviews.title: So impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this ottoman, especially for the terrific price. it's sturdy and looks way more expensive than it is!
customer_reviews.author: J Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! I’m giving 4 stars because it has a weird smell... like glue...
customer_reviews.author: Ivana Gobbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for great room!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and daughter in law to use in their family room. They love it and it functions great for their area.
customer_reviews.author: Susie B Easley

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Seam is already coming apart. No small children or pets in the household to cause this.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri V.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese garbage
customer_reviews.text: Just more Chinese made garbage. It only has four thing you need to assemble (legs), you would think they could at least get those measurements right...
customer_reviews.author: Coff

customer_reviews.title: but looks great in my living room
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for mid century modern storage for my kids and finally found this at amazon. It’s pricey for toys storage/ottoman, but looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: riris mcclellan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ottoman, I am very picky and this was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy this is, and it's the perfect height to slide right into either corner of our sectional to create even more space. Our cats love sleeping on it. It assembles very easily and, like I said, is very, very firm--no wobbling. The lid opens excellently and has plenty of room for storing lap blankets, remotes, books, serving trays, etc. Awesome price and well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in person
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I bought a table on Amazon. I thought it would turn out cheap looking and be of poor quality but I went for it anyway as I was seeking a softer table for my little ones to be able to play around. This looks like I got it at West Elm or somewhere comparable, I'm so surprised at how nice it actually looks and how it is holding up! I highly recommend it, I would not normally purchase furniture like this but WOW, I'm highly impressed. I've had it a while now and it's not peeling or anything, it's enduring the toddler test and the storage space is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ash B.

customer_reviews.title: Update: not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Update: after having it for less than a month i noticed that one of the legs split in half... not sure when or how this happened. Possibly damaged/ partially broken when it arrived and then completely broke off? I really thought it was sturdy but apparently not. Original: LOVE IT! I get so many compliments! Make sure you take note of the measurements because it’s quite large! Luckily the bigger the better for my space. Color matches and quality is great. I store 4 guest pillows, sheets, and a quilt inside for the pull out couch. It seems very sturdy and i feel it will last quite a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Premium look for a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ottoman for the money. Simple build out, took maybe 5 minutes. It is a large, awkward box - not terribly heavy but difficult to handle for one person. There are a few imperfections - the lid doesn’t line up perfectly, the hinges for the ottoman top are exposed and the screws that hold the top onto the hinges aren’t flush. That said, I’d still give it a solid 5 stars for the price and looks.
customer_reviews.author: d4nk7

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected.  Tall enough for robot vacuums to go under
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman looks like leather but has more of a suede feel. That’s not a complaint from me, as I actually like It better that way, but more of a warning if you are expecting a leather feel to it. For anybody who cares, the height of the ottoman is high enough for a roomba to go under it. That was actually what drew me to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to add some texture and more comfort to the living room since the couch we got is a little smaller than expected. We love the storage and the feel and look of this piece! We love it and are very satisfied with this purchance and the build of it! Very easy to put together as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jay and Tay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman, it is a nice size, it arrived quickly in perfect condition. All we had to do is put the legs on. It opens and closes nicely, there is a no-pinch hinge which is nice. It is comfortable to put your feet on. The fabric looks like a vintage leather/almost like suede. I got the chestnut brown which is a nice medium brown color. I put this in my beach house living room, this was perfect as I didn't want to spend a lot of money. The couch is a sleeper so I store the linens for the sleeper in it. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to receive our ottoman and would still like one. It was delivered late and the item was completely damaged. The hinges were bent out so the lid didn’t close flush, not even something that can be fixed. Amazon said it could be replaced then changed their story and said it couldn’t. I ordered it a week ago and need something by Friday. Terrible customer service by amazon. Still hoping to try the ottoman in good condition because the aesthetic was nice.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to replace a nice coffee table we had
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a nice coffee table we had. While I liked the look of our old ttable, kicking your feet up on it was always uncomfortable, and we had all our games hidden next to the couch. Now all the games are nicely organized inside this table, and we can kick our feet up comfortably when watching TV. And it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marando Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Nice quality. Easy assembly. I had been on the lookout for a distressed leather ottoman for our living room for some time. I looked everywhere. Finally found this one that met all our needs (size, storage, color). It's sturdy, kids have tendency to jump on and in it, even though we prefer they do not. Slides easily on carpeted floor so we can shift it from one side of our sofa to the other depending on where everyone is camped out.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2CLandC

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as pictured. The color is on point and everything is very solid. Unfortunately, when I open it to store blankets, it is sooooooo smelly. It smells horrible. I would have never bought this if I knew how bad it would smell. It's been months and the smell is still there. I will never store anything in it because I tried and my blankets smelled horrible until I washed them. Plus dog hair tends to stick to it so I have to brush it off every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best footrest/storage ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is lovely and I wish I got it in the saddle brown, ultimately I settled for the darker brown because saddle brown was sold out!!!! I love it, it fits all my guest sheets, pillows, and comforter in there perfectly. This thing is huge, I would have preferred a more rectangular shape, but their rectangular option is smaller than the square. Make a rectangle shaped option with the same storage as the square pleaseEEEEEE
customer_reviews.author: The Mixed

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price...
customer_reviews.text: It would be perfect if it came in a larger size. The length of 48" is good, but I wish the width were a little wider than 18" because it would seem more "high-end, or sophisticated." I replaced a larger ottoman with this one, because I liked the "leather-look." But it looks a little undersized with my furniture. Overall, the style is very nice, the "leather" is nice and the color is perfect. The price was fair, but I wish I could get this same thing--just larger. It seems to be made for a small sofa set.
customer_reviews.author: otdow0507

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ottoman, and functional. It has plenty of space for storage. We use it for storing the kids’ toys. It’s sturdy and the material is soft and tough. We sit on it with no issues. The look adds style and warmth to our family room.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brucker

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table when my daughter started crawling to replace our wooden coffee table. It was one of the lower priced tables I saw in this style so I wasn’t expecting much and since we had a little one and a dog that we’re going to be spilling drooling all over it that was fine. But this table has proved me wrong! It has held up great over the past year and a half. There have been plenty of spills but the texture of the fabric you can’t notice them. It also is great for storing our throw blankets. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Great color, sturdy, good storage, and nice size!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ottoman. Perfect size for our space. Seems like a strong lasting fabric versus the faux leather that tends to rub off over time. We really enjoy this!!! Oh and just big enough to fit both our sets of feet 🙂 although my husband uses it much more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: SydneyKate

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and color.
customer_reviews.text: Vegan material looks just like leather and is buttery soft with natural looking wear. Great medium brown shade. Overall size and amount of storage is great for a smaller space.
customer_reviews.author: lindb

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. Both of the struts that hold the storage compartment lid open were compromised. One strut completely separated from the inside compartment, the other was bent and beginning to separate. Amazon helped me resolve the issue but overall quality for price was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can’t beat this. The legs went on in about 3 minutes and the fabric looks and feels like a suede leather. Seems very sturdy. The storage is great for a few blankets or other items and when you open it, it doesn’t fall shut on you. Very well made and affordable. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing find for the price. It looks gorgeous and is so sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Puder

customer_reviews.title: Price is right for function/fashion
customer_reviews.text: This works so well in my family room in front of a sofa so I can store all those things that clutter and they are also close at hand. The color is a chocolate distressed faux leather - I like it. Also the legs are deco and I can vacuum under it and it is light weight to move to prop my legs up and be comfortable watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Fun to Shop

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What We Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Our home is being restyled in an industrial mid-century modern design theme, and this ottoman is perfect for our living room. It looks like real leather, the storage capacity is surprizingly large, opens and closes easy and the color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: TFrye

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, sturdy, expensive-looking
customer_reviews.text: I love this more than I ever thought I would. I can fit a ton of stuff in there and was able to get rid of a small chest of stuff as a result. It looks and feels high end but the price is great. So happy! Your will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I have given this for stars instead of 5 is that the looks of it are a little too distressed. It just collects a lot of dust because of the distressed Ness of it.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. GLEASON

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.text: While this certainly does not look like real distressed leather, it’s an acceptable substitute. The feel is like fabric, not plastic, which is a plus. It fit the need I had, and doesn’t scream “fake”.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Banana

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for over a year now and it’s held up great. We got it to replace our coffee table when our baby started moving around. Between a toddler and 2 cats it’s held up great. It even cleaned up well after my son threw up on it!
customer_reviews.author: H. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: So freaking cute. The leather is lighter then the picture which is just what I wanted. Looks super modern.
customer_reviews.author: McKinnah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday. Perfect size for our smaller living room and the storage area is great. Seems to be well constructed. I’ll update My review if it doesn’t hold up. This is the saddle color. Nice medium brown.
customer_reviews.author: Jim winkler

customer_reviews.title: Great looking ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It added the extra space needed for dogs to spread out.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Top is crooked
customer_reviews.text: Top is crooked, hinges are not aligned properly. Going to try to fix it myself. Also, I thought this was a faux leather material, it’s not. It’s fabric that “looks” like fake leather. It’s smooth and soft. Hoping it will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great as a coffee table 38 inch
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived...in perfect condition. No scratches or damages. It opens and closes very well. The size is perfect as a coffee table. Love the legs for the mid century style.
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture, it is easy to assemble and looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece.
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is exactly what I was looking for. Great storage and isn’t too long taking up too much space in our living room. It is sturdy enough for my 30lb toddler to climb on and Husband and I can sit comfortably on it as well (180lbs & 140lbs). Material seems to be holding up well to my toddlers everyday antics which is a big plus. Would totally recommend this piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: zachary orr

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black one. Perfect size and color. Not shiny. Great ottoman
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice big Ottoman, fit perfectly into our space. Even though it's faux leather it looks and feels real. We looked around for a good price and quality product and this hit both. The fabric wears nicely and the compartment inside can fit alot and it will stay in place when open until you close it. The hardware is smooth and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinky but pretty
customer_reviews.text: Ended up being just the right choice. I love the brown color. It's perfect for a farmhouse decor, boho or rustic. Sturdy and has a storage. Only thing terrible is the smell that lingers in the storage compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Klingenberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy! I will say that we have dogs and their hair gets on the ottoman. But a lint roller takes care of it pretty well. Other than that, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bonnett

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For how inexpensive it is, it’s held up extremely well with two small children climbing on it and eating off of it much to my chagrin. Good storage space for toys or anything.
customer_reviews.author: SarNor

customer_reviews.title: Love this Ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this ottoman! Great storage space! Only assembly required is attaching the legs. This piece looks way more expensive than it costs. Very stylish, comfortable, and extremely good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Burkmon

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! It’s nice and heavy, I would never think that it is going to break with someone sitting on it. It looks great and the storage is a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Tkelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Love it so much. Great Quality. I actually kept the legs off because I have a floor sofa and it fits the style of my living room perfectly. Hunted for this find for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Addie Andrews

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love it! Just have to put legs on. Very soft and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Loupita

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Modern look, no issues when arrived but l wish the material was a better quality. It can easy rippet
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: It’s so perfect. The opening is such a plus with the storage. And so easy to put together and light weight
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, Stylish and Stain Resistant
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy and stain resistant. We've spilled a number of drinks and food on this thing, thanks to to my daughter, and everything always wipes up. Storage capacity is huge and it's very stylish. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first about buying this because I read the other reviews however I am so pleasantly surprised with this purchase, especially for the price!! For faux leather it looks and feels amazing and it's very sturdy, including the legs and hinge. Some of the bad renews complained of the top lid of the ottoman not being aligned but ours is perfect! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ~ All pieces were in the box. Easy to put on the legs. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Maxey

customer_reviews.title: Great, however two of the legs had some issues.
customer_reviews.text: Two of the wood legs have slight imperfections. One has a vertical crack about 75% of the way up the leg. The other had a large knot in the wood that is a bit on the structural side. I'll be writing the manufacturer asking for two replacement legs. The product is great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: miniature furniture
customer_reviews.text: Pay close attention to the size of this item...its quite small for an average sized living room. About the size of an arm chair ottoman
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great ottoman for the price. I suggest adding 2 inch felt pads to the feet to replace the plastic pins. Looks great in our livingroom, and feel sturdy enough for both me and the dog to hang out together on. That's about 200 lbs between us.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece of furniture. Easy to assemble & nice looking. Faux leather is soft & attractive. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha M Frazee

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman was perfect and at a great price. Easy to assemble and color looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Teasdale

customer_reviews.title: Everything I’d hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped for. Good quality. Nice size storage. Easy to assemble legs.
customer_reviews.author: LBThomas

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the really expensive ones in real life
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman/storage/table/desk very easy to assemble just had to add legs very nice quality material the top opens easily and shuts slowly and has a ton of room to put whatever you need to put in there couple blankets etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and storage of the ottoman! Only downfall is that dog hair easily sticks to it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The storage unit holds extra pillows in our bedroom and works great as a midway step for my senior spaniel to hop onto the bed!
customer_reviews.author: T. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Leather coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy that I ordered this modern leather table! It goes perfect with my style! I’m 100% satisfied 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: This may not be leather, but the look and feel of this material is amazing - very impressed! They style is perfect for a vintage, modern vibe
customer_reviews.author: Spudchik

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Very well made and looks much more expensive than it actually is. Very durable with a toddler and two dogs, and fresh storage for toys! Amazing value. So happy about this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Liz Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ottoman. It was easy to assemble and looks beautiful in my living-room.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Martin

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome in person
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cozy sofa blankets. Nice and sturdy, great color.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L.

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and Quite Attractive ottoman. It came very quick. It's very easy to install no muscles necessary. I wish they made this item longer so it could be used as a coffee table as well!
customer_reviews.author: MYS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Looks EXACTLY like photos. It’s as big as you would expect. It’s sturdy, easy to put together and so cute
customer_reviews.author: Erika Davy

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and durable!
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman looks great in my family room! The styling is on trend and the faux leather is holding up great with my family and two 50lb dogs that take turns laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Pruski

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Looks great with my sectional. Wish it was a tad bigger
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Segreti

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Taller than I had envisioned, but looks great and serves for storing blankets and such while doubling as a nice foot/leg rest.
customer_reviews.author: TMUSconnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I hoped for. great size and quality construction, durable fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Vic S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Goes great in our living room and live all the storage
customer_reviews.author: Jjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item came damaged on two corners but we decided to keep the item. The box came slightly damaged, but intact. An exchange was not worth the trouble of returning and waiting for a new item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a damaged box but was in perfect condition! Exactly as pictured and exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double check the hardware
customer_reviews.text: Item came defective. Will return. One of the hardwares is damaged which makes the edge misaligned and doesn’t close properly. Pretty disappointed. I hope it’s just this particular one
customer_reviews.author: baoye

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Great product looks perfect in my living room! The storage isn’t that deep but it’s awesome for four blankets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Distressed black.... Packaged well. No scratches. Just have to attach the legs with the Allen wrench that came with. Good storage too.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Good Find
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman was easy to assemble by myself. It looks great and functions well as a foot rest and storage piece. Guests always ask were we got it from and are surprised when we say Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Erica S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece, but came beyond damaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, but came beyond damaged. Hinge completely broken, one side caved in, and the legs all beat up. So sad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice ottoman .
customer_reviews.text: I got this ottoman for 234$. Not sure why the price went up to 599$. Buyer beware .
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love my ottoman
customer_reviews.text: First off very easy to attach the bottom legs.. lots of storage space for books, magazines, remote controls, etc. Also makes for a comfy leg rest or living room picnic table
customer_reviews.author: Romeo miller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, we'll built and is exactly as stated in the ad
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for as an ottoman for a pair if sitting chairs. It's well built, sturdy and arrived ahead of scheduled date. Its every thing the ad said it was.
customer_reviews.author: casey jones

customer_reviews.title: Great storage ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Have received many compliments on this. Is the perfect size and great living room centerpiece
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Legs were a bit hard to screw ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Legs were a bit hard to screw in all the way. Overall very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ottoman. The price is amazing and the quality is great! Looks so much more expenive than it is. So happy about this purchase and looks fantastic in our family room.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Love the ottoman - works well in the space I wanted it. Only issue was it didn’t come with the wrench to assemble it. Luckily I had one that worked from other items.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Jordahl

customer_reviews.title: As described, easy to assemble, love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, love the color, and the perfect size. Bought this as a safer coffee table option with a 14month old. Very happy with the purchase! Probably will buy another for our basement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: Could not decide for a few months if I wanted a coffee table or an ottoman. Really happy I went with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman. Good quality and exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ottoman. We have 3 kids and it’s held up great so far.

product_meta.title: Simpli Home Owen 34 inch Wide Rectangle Coffee Table Lift Top Storage Ottoman, Cocktail Footrest Stool in Upholstered Distressed Grey Taupe Faux Air Leather, Mid Century Modern, Living Room
product_meta.description: Size:34 inch| Color:Distressed Grey TaupeUpdate your space with the Owen Mid Century Storage Ottoman. Its modern style will add a fresh on trend look to your home. It features a lift up lid and a large interior storage space. Made with solid wood and distressed Faux Air Leather for stylish durability and comfort. Whether used in the living room, family room or den, it will be the showpiece that completes the room. Child safety hinge to prevent lid slamming Simple assembly; just attach legs Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography At Simpli Home we believe in creating excellent, high quality products made from the finest materials at an affordable price. Every one of our products come with a 1-year warranty and easy returns if you are not satisfied
feature_bullets: HAND CONSTRUCTED using solid wood, engineered woods and upholstered with durable Distressed Grey Taupe Faux Air Leather
LARGE INTERIOR STORAGE SPACE with split lift top
Mid Century design and solid wood framed ottoman base
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL large square ottoman can be used in, living room, family room as a coffee table, foot stool, accent furniture or provide additional sitting
